item.description:
A special St. Patrick's Day Itsy Bitsy Yoga Class for you and your Tyke!

 

TYKE Itsy Bitsy Yoga Class (ages 21 months through 4.5 years old)

Description: Tykes Itsy Bitsy Yoga combines unique toddler-friendly yoga poses with songs, stories, and games to create an enriching parent/child activity. Tykes will learn yoga through social interaction, repetition, and play. Tykes also learn how to relieve frustration, improve motor skills, and increase attention span by actively following directions. Help your tyke build the foundation for a healthy and fit lifestyle while having fun! No yoga experience is required.
Thank you for arranging just 1 parent/caregiver per child.


Cost: $15 includes 1 parent+1 child. (pre-payment required w/ YES RSVP). 

About Us:

Weekend IBY Meetup classes are taught by Alycia Clutterbuck.

Itsy Bitsy Yoga was created by Helen Garabedian, an Infant Developmental Movement Educator, yoga teacher, and mother. Learn more at www.ItsyBitsyYoga.com
item.name: Weekend TYKES Itsy Bitsy Yoga Meetup -March 2012--St. Patrick's Day!
